mn74:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati gijjhakute pabbate sukarakhatayam.
mn74:2.1: Atha kho dighanakho paribbajako yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
mn74:2.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho dighanakho paribbajako bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn74:2.6: ‘sabbam me nakkhamati’ti, esapi te ditthi nakkhamati”ti?
mn74:2.7: “Esa ce me, bho gotama, ditthi khameyya, tampassa tadisameva, tampassa tadisameva”ti.
mn74:3.1: “Ato kho te, aggivessana, bahu hi bahutara lokasmim ye evamahamsu:
mn74:3.3: Te tanceva ditthim nappajahanti annanca ditthim upadiyanti.
mn74:3.4: Ato kho te, aggivessana, tanu hi tanutara lokasmim ye evamahamsu:
mn74:3.6: Te tanceva ditthim pajahanti annanca ditthim na upadiyanti.
mn74:4.7: Tatraggivessana, ye te samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino: ‘sabbam me khamati’ti
mn74:4.8: tesamayam ditthi saragaya santike, sannogaya santike, abhinandanaya santike, ajjhosanaya santike, upadanaya santike;
mn74:4.9: tatraggivessana ye te samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino: ‘sabbam me nakkhamati’ti
mn74:4.10: tesamayam ditthi asaragaya santike, asannogaya santike, anabhinandanaya santike, anajjhosanaya santike, anupadanaya santike”ti.
mn74:5.1: Evam vutte, dighanakho paribbajako bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn74:5.2: “ukkamseti me bhavam gotamo ditthigatam, samukkamseti me bhavam gotamo ditthigatan”ti.
mn74:5.5: Ya hi tesam khamati sayam ditthi saragaya santike, sannogaya santike, abhinandanaya santike, ajjhosanaya santike, upadanaya santike;
mn74:5.6: ya hi tesam nakkhamati sayam ditthi asaragaya santike, asannogaya santike, anabhinandanaya santike, anajjhosanaya santike, anupadanaya santike.
mn74:6.1: Tatraggivessana, ye te samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
mn74:6.6: imance aham ditthim thamasa paramasa abhinivissa vohareyyam—
mn74:6.9: yo cayam samano va brahmano va evamvadi evamditthi—sabbam me nakkhamatiti,
mn74:6.10: yo cayam samano va brahmano va evamvadi evamditthi—ekaccam me khamati, ekaccam me nakkhamatiti—
mn74:6.12: Iti viggahe sati vivado, vivade sati vighato, vighate sati vihesa’.
mn74:6.13: Iti so viggahanca vivadanca vighatanca vihesanca attani sampassamano tanceva ditthim pajahati annanca ditthim na upadiyati.
mn74:6.14: Evametasam ditthinam pahanam hoti, evametasam ditthinam patinissaggo hoti.

mn74:9.1: Ayam kho panaggivessana, kayo rupi catumahabhutiko matapettikasambhavo odanakummasupacayo aniccucchadanaparimaddanabhedanaviddhamsanadhammo, aniccato dukkhato rogato gandato sallato aghato abadhato parato palokato sunnato anattato samanupassitabbo.
mn74:9.2: Tassimam kayam aniccato dukkhato rogato gandato sallato aghato abadhato parato palokato sunnato anattato samanupassato yo kayasmim kayachando kayasneho kayanvayata sa pahiyati.
mn74:10.2: sukha vedana, dukkha vedana, adukkhamasukha vedana.
mn74:10.3: Yasmim, aggivessana, samaye sukham vedanam vedeti, neva tasmim samaye dukkham vedanam vedeti, na adukkhamasukham vedanam vedeti;
mn74:10.5: Yasmim, aggivessana, samaye dukkham vedanam vedeti, neva tasmim samaye sukham vedanam vedeti, na adukkhamasukham vedanam vedeti;
mn74:10.7: Yasmim, aggivessana, samaye adukkhamasukham vedanam vedeti, neva tasmim samaye sukham vedanam vedeti, na dukkham vedanam vedeti;
mn74:11.1: Sukhapi kho, aggivessana, vedana anicca sankhata paticcasamuppanna khayadhamma vayadhamma viragadhamma nirodhadhamma;
mn74:11.2: dukkhapi kho, aggivessana, vedana anicca sankhata paticcasamuppanna khayadhamma vayadhamma viragadhamma nirodhadhamma;
mn74:11.3: adukkhamasukhapi kho, aggivessana, vedana anicca sankhata paticcasamuppanna khayadhamma vayadhamma viragadhamma nirodhadhamma.
mn74:12.1: Evam passam, aggivessana, sutava ariyasavako sukhayapi vedanaya nibbindati, dukkhayapi vedanaya nibbindati, adukkhamasukhayapi vedanaya nibbindati;
mn74:12.2: nibbindam virajjati, viraga vimuccati. Vimuttasmim, vimuttamiti nanam hoti.
mn74:12.3: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati.
mn74:13.1: Evam vimuttacitto kho, aggivessana, bhikkhu na kenaci samvadati, na kenaci vivadati, yanca loke vuttam tena voharati, aparamasan”ti.
mn74:14.1: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma sariputto bhagavato pitthito thito hoti bhagavantam bijayamano.
mn74:14.3: “tesam tesam kira no bhagava dhammanam abhinna pahanamaha, tesam tesam kira no sugato dhammanam abhinna patinissaggamaha”ti.
mn74:14.4: Iti hidam ayasmato sariputtassa patisancikkhato anupadaya asavehi cittam vimucci.
mn74:15.1: Dighanakhassa pana paribbajakassa virajam vitamalam dhammacakkhum udapadi:
mn74:15.3: Atha kho dighanakho paribbajako ditthadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogalhadhammo tinnavicikiccho vigatakathankatho vesarajjappatto aparappaccayo satthusasane bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn74:16.2: Seyyathapi, bho gotama, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya, paticchannam va vivareyya, mulhassa va maggam acikkheyya, andhakare va telapajjotam dhareyya: ‘cakkhumanto rupani dakkhanti’ti; evameva kho bhota gotamena anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
mn74:16.3: Esaham bhavantam gotamam saranam gacchami dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
mn74:16.4: Upasakam mam bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
